fighterA.name: a brown field mouse
fighterA.description: a sun-drenched meadow filled with wildflowers, bordered by a crumbling stone wall overgrown with ivy. worn leather boots small wooden flute scattered wildflower petals a brown field mouse, standing alert and tense quiet and watchful, with an underlying sense of vulnerability and potential threat. the mouse clutches a tiny, tarnished button in its paws. a hawk circles high above the meadow.

fighterB.name: Godzilla
fighterB.description: a volcanic wasteland stretches as far as the eye can see, dominated by jagged obsidian peaks and rivers of molten rock. ash falls constantly, coating everything in a grey film. the air is thick with sulfurous fumes. large boulder scorched remains of machinery fragmented crystal shard godzilla heat haze desolate and terrifying, filled with immense destructive power and a sense of hopelessness. a faint signal emanating from the depths of an active volcano. strange energy readings detected near a collapsed research facility.

battleLog.attackCommentary: The tiny titan unleashes a flurry of bites in a desperate hail-mary, landing a surprisingly powerful hit that registers for 800 damage against Godzilla! It's an early upset, but can.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: a brown field mouse raises their guard against the incoming attack!
battleLog.randomEvent: a brown field mouse narrowly dodges Godzilla's attack! a brown field mouse finds a weak spot and deals devastating damage!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Godzilla levels a devastating atomic breath on the tiny brown field mouse in round two! A 322 damage strike leaves no room for comeback. The fight's getting INTOLERABLELY intense.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Round two's tension is palpable as a tiny titan like Pipkin dances on Godzilla's colossal atomic breath, every flicker a near miss in this David and Goliath showdown. The King.
battleLog.randomEvent: Godzilla uses undefined to enhance their attack!
